entities.name: molly
entities.description: Molly is Harry's mother. She is mentioned as someone who might not approve of something.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and narrator of the story. He is being sent off by his godfather Sirius.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is Harry's godfather. He is trying to persuade Harry to wear hand-knitted mittens and is about to leave with him.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts who treats Sirius poorly in their Occlumency classes. He is mentioned as someone Harry does not want to get involved with.

relationships.description: Harry and Sirius have a godfather-godson relationship. This is mentioned in the text as 'his godfather'.
